name: Kopparberg Mixed Fruits Tropical
description: This refreshing non alcoholic cider provides a tasty tropical twist to the iconic Kopparberg Mixed Fruits. With pineapple, passion fruit, and mango, this cider is the perfect alcohol-free alternative. The Kopparberg Brewery was re-established in 1994, when two brothers bought the old brewery in Sweden. Many generations of local families have worked for the brewery and its cider is now sold in more than 30 countries.

name: Kopparberg Mixed Fruit
description: Refreshingly light with a delicious punch of raspberry and blackcurrant. Uncompromising on flavour, this alcohol-free cider will bring back the taste of summer! The Kopparberg Brewery was re-established in 1994, when two brothers bought the old brewery in Sweden. Many generations of local families have worked for the brewery and its cider is now sold in more than 30 countries.

name: Erdinger alkoholfrei Grapefruit
description: Brewed with grapefruit to create a refreshingly fruity drinking experience. Erdinger Alkoholfrei Grapefruit has a long lasting, pleasant flavour with bittersweet grapefruit aromas. Perfectly blended to deliver deliciously tangy notes, this wheat beer has also been brewed with Vitamins B9, B12, and C which all help promote the normal functioning of the immune system. Erdinger's strives to produce quality beers. As a traditional brewery it makes no compromises when it comes to its process; the experienced brewmaster selects specific wheat and barley varieties that are particularly suited to creating excellent wheat beers.

name: Old Mout Pineapple & Raspberry
description: The meeting of exotic pineapple and tart juicy raspberries, this refreshingly light infusion of flavour is full of natural sweetness. Old Mout began with a cycling trip to England; two pioneering friends with a passion for cider and new ideas. The adventurous duo, inspired by amazing island fruits, developed a range of award winning flavours in New Zealand, bringing Old Mout, and a little bit of Kiwi spirit, to the UK.

name: Rothaus HefeWeizen Alkoholfrei - 0.5%
description: A full flavoured alcohol-free wheat beer brewed under the 'German purity law'. Wheat malt, aromatic hops, and Rothaus' special yeast deliver this pleasantly tangy, sweet beer. Brewed using a gentle process to remove the alcohol to retain key beer aromas. Rothaus’ brewery is located in the middle of the Black Forest. As well as brewing beer, Rothaus also operates a restaurant, a cosy bar, and a shop, which showcase their amazing beers and local specialties.

name: Divine Brewing Co Vesta Alcohol Free Golden Ale
description: A light golden ale, Vesta is a fusion of Vienna and pale malts with Cascade and Citra hops creating an easy drinking hoppy ale that is perfectly refreshing.

name: Divine Brewing Co Atlas AF English Bitter
description: Inspired by the Head Brewer's love of traditional ales, Atlas is a medium-bodied dark amber English bitter that showcases roasted barley and Munich malt with hints of honey and caramel.

name: Divine Brewing Co Polaris Alcohol Free Porter
description: A traditional style of beer, Divine Brewing Polaris Porter is dark and complex with a balanced hop profile. Brewed with liquorice root, an original ingredient dating back hundreds of years, but now rarely used, that adds a subtle sweetness. It’s a perfect balance of old and new. This beer is brewed in the traditional way, nothing added, nothing removed and fully fermented. Only the skill of the brewer has been used to create this alcohol free beer.

name: Brulo Sabro Galaxy DDH Alcohol Free IPA
description: This Galaxy DDH IPA is the second release of Brulo’s alcohol-free DDH series. This double-dry hopped IPA has intense juicy hop flavours and aromas of tropical fruits. A perfect mix of Sabro and Galaxy hops. Galaxy’s signature pineapple, passionfruit, and citrus notes are perfectly paired with the characteristic coconut delight that Sabra brings to the table. Brulo was founded in 2019 by James Brown. James' desire is to create quality, hop forward alcohol-free craft beer for the modern world. Launched with a simple promise - to only make the beer they love, focusing on taste, quality and creativity. Using only the finest ingredients, innovative yeast cultures and modern brewing techniques to create beers that are always alcohol-free, don't hold back on taste and are vegan too!

name: Brulo 7 Hop 7 Grain DDH Alcohol Free IPA
description: This beer combines seven different grains with seven fresh and aromatic hops. A medium-full bodied IPA with a pleasant bitterness. Brulo has generously double dry hopped to deliver a hazy beer with big waves of the tropical fruit aromas and flavours. Brulo was founded in 2019 by James Brown with the desire to create quality, hop forward, alcohol free craft beer for the modern world. They launched with a simple promise, to only make the beer they love, focusing on taste, quality and creativity. Using only the finest ingredients, innovative yeast cultures and modern brewing techniques to create beers that are always alcohol free, never compromise on taste and are Vegan!

name: Brulo 5 Fruit Gose Alcohol Free Beer
description: Made from all natural ingredients, water, malted barley, yeast, hops and fruit. A tropical delight, with a smooth mouthfeel, all thanks to the fresh mango, passionfruit, guava, apricot and orange. A super refreshing gose beer with a sourness typical to the style. Brulo was founded in 2019 by James Brown with the desire to create quality, hop forward alcohol free craft beer for the modern world. They launched with a simple promise, to only make the beer they love, focusing on taste, quality and creativity. Using only the finest ingredients, innovative yeast cultures and modern brewing techniques to create beers that are always alcohol free, never compromise on the taste and Vegan!

name: Seven Bro7hers Alcohol Free Pale Ale
description: This pale ale is the first alcohol free beer produced by Seven Bro7hers. Pale, light and hoppy with citrus and fruity aromas, this ale has a balanced bitter finish. Seven Bro7hers worked tirelessly to make sure their alcohol free ale packs a punch in flavour and offers the same satisfying taste beer lovers have grown to expect from all Seven Bro7hers ales. The brewery is owned by 7 actual brothers who developed an interest in beer due to their father brewing at home when they were children. They brew their beers in Salford, Manchester where you can also visit the tap room. Seven Bro7hers want their beer to be for everyones’ enjoyment and to bring people together.

name: Guinness Alcohol Free Stout
description: Guinness 0.0 is an alcohol free Guinness brewed at St James's Gate, Dublin, Ireland. In the same style as the original, this Guinness has zero alcohol but is rich and creamy with a velvety finish. Using a unique cold filtration method to deliver the smooth perfectly balanced flavour, Guinness 0.0 is a must try for any stout lover.

name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro Non Alcoholic Lager
description: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0 is an alcohol free Peroni that boasts a rich and intense flavour, with a delicate fruity aroma. It is brewed with the same Nostrano dell’Isola maize that is unique to Peroni and used in their famous alcoholic version of Nastro Azzurro. This is actually a non-alcoholic Peroni which means that it has zero alcohol rather than a small amount. This Peroni alcohol free beer is an elegant and sophisticated citrusy, crisp lager.

name: Lowtide Promises I Made Myself AF IPA
description: Lowtide’s refreshing alcohol free IPA has been developed in partnership with Newtown Park Brewery. A combination of some classic and also the brewer’s favourite hops, Promises I Made Myself is a flavour-packed low alcohol IPA that will hit your palate with tropical notes of papaya, mango and grapefruit.

name: Lowtide Forgot To Take My Pils AF Lager
description: Lowtide’s alcohol free lager, Forget To Take My Pils, uses Keller Pilsner to enhance the traditional flavours of this thirst quenching low alcohol lager. Packed full of Pilsner Malt, Saaz and Perle hops, Forget To Take My Pils has been double dry hopped with Azacca taking this alcohol free pilsner to another dimension. The added citrus and tropical notes from Azacca craftily complement the distinctive pilsner experience.

name: Lowtide NEIPA the Cosmic Turtle New England IPA
description: This alcohol-free New England IPA has a beautifully pillowy mouthfeel accompanied by a phenomenal fruity aroma and taste, that comes from the combination of Citra, Mosaic, Amarillo and El Dorado hops.

name: Corona Cero Non Alcoholic Lager
description: Corona Cero non alcoholic lager is the zero alcohol version of Corona Extra. A low calorie, thirst quencher with a subtle citrus flavour, Corona Cero is brewed with all-natural ingredients. This crisp, refreshing alcohol free lager should always be savoured with a wedge of lime.

name: Kaiserdom Non Alcoholic Lager
description: Kaiserdom alcohol free lager is brewed in Bamberg, Germany in line with German purity laws, the Reinheitsgebot. This alcohol free lager is isotonic and perfect as a post exercise refreshment.

name: Alcohol Free Lager Mixed Case - Exclusive
description: About The Alcohol Free Lager Mixed CaseThis alcohol free lager mixed case contains 13 different lagers; two bottles or cans of each. Perfect for an introduction to alcohol-free lager as a taster pack which you can share and compare or for anyone wanting variation in their beer fridge.
